drtn.game.effects

Class PlayerEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • drtn.game.effects.PlayerEffect

  • public class PlayerEffect
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String description
      A description of the effect
      private float[] modifiers
      Array holding the inventory modifiers that the effect imposes These are either to be added/subtracted to/from the player's current resource counts or multiplied by them, depending on the value of the [multiply] variable declared below
      private boolean multiply
      Determines whether the effect is to add to (or subtract from) the player's resources or to multiply them by set factors
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the effect
      private java.lang.Runnable runnable
      Object containing a method that the effect can automatically trigger if and when it is run

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerEffect(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, float oreModifier, float energyModifier, float foodModifier, float moneyModifier, boolean multiply, java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      Constructor that imports the parameters of the effect along with a custom block of code in which it can be used

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeRunnable()
      Executes the runnable
      java.lang.String getDescription() 
      void impose(Player player)
      Imposes the effect on the player by changing the resources that they have Their resources can be added to, subtracted from, multiplied or divided

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        The name of the effect

      • description

        private java.lang.String description
        A description of the effect

      • modifiers

        private float[] modifiers
        Array holding the inventory modifiers that the effect imposes These are either to be added/subtracted to/from the player's current resource counts or multiplied by them, depending on the value of the [multiply] variable declared below

      • multiply

        private boolean multiply
        Determines whether the effect is to add to (or subtract from) the player's resources or to multiply them by set factors

      • runnable

        private java.lang.Runnable runnable
        Object containing a method that the effect can automatically trigger if and when it is run

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerEffect

        public PlayerEffect(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    float oreModifier,
                    float energyModifier,
                    float foodModifier,
                    float moneyModifier,
                    boolean multiply,
                    java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Constructor that imports the parameters of the effect along with a custom block of code in which it can be used
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the effect
        description - A description of the effect
        oreModifier - The ore-count modifier that the effect can impose
        energyModifier - The energy-count modifier that the effect can impose
        foodModifier - The food-count modifier that the effect can impose
        moneyModifier - The money-count modifier that the effect can impose
        multiply - Determines whether the effect's parameters are to be additive or multiplicative when applied to a player's resource-counts
        runnable - The code to be executed when the effect is imposed through natural means

    • Method Detail

      • impose

        public void impose(Player player)
        Imposes the effect on the player by changing the resources that they have Their resources can be added to, subtracted from, multiplied or divided
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is to be affected

      • executeRunnable

        public void executeRunnable()
        Executes the runnable

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
